## Why
<!-- Explain the motivation / problem solved -->

## Related Issue
<!-- Link to issue: Fixes #123, Closes #456, Relates to #789 -->

## Type of Change
<!-- Check all that apply -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [] New driver (adds support for new device)
- [X] Enhancement (improves existing functionality)
- [ ] Documentation (updates docs/README)
- [ ] CI/CD (workflow changes)
- [ ] Breaking change (existing functionality changes)

## How Has This Been Tested?
<!-- Describe your testing process -->
- [ ] Tested locally with `homey app run`
- [ ] Tested device pairing
- [ ] Tested all capabilities
- [ ] Tested edge cases

## Checklist
<!-- All must be checked before merge -->
- [x] `homey app validate --level publish` passes
- [ ] ESLint passes (no errors)
- [ ] Device matrix updated (if driver change)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] No console.log() statements left
- [ ] Code follows project style
- [ ] Commit messages are clear

## Screenshots / Logs (if applicable)

## Additional Notes
<!-- Any other information for reviewers -->

title: EN: integration harvest – crawlers, validate loop, workflows; FR: intégration harvest – crawlers, boucle validate, workflows
body: EN: This PR integrates harvest tools (forum+GitHub crawlers), validate auto-fix loop, CI/Pages fixes, and driver manifest normalization.\nFR: Ce PR intègre les outils de collecte (forum+GitHub), la boucle d'auto-fix de validation, les correctifs CI/Pages, et la normalisation des manifests de drivers.
